headline: AI-Fueled Demand and HAMR Innovation Could Be a Game Changer for Seagate (STX)
summary: In recent months, Seagate Technology Holdings has drawn considerable analyst and media attention due to surging demand for data storage amid the AI boom, with multiple commentators highlighting the company's leadership in Heat Assisted Magnetic Recording (HAMR) technology and its initiatives like a US$5 billion share buyback. This wave of interest underscores how Seagate’s technological advances and focus on next-generation storage solutions are positioning it as a leader within a rapidly...
